name: People Themed Quiz: Clint Eastwood Movies | 10 Questions

questions.text: In "In the Line of Fire", Clint is haunted by what event?
questions.explanation:
Assassination of JFK.

	He "blew it" with JFK and has been haunted by it ever since. Good movie. Rene Russo as the girl friend, John Malkovich as the crazy bad guy.

questions.text: In "Hang 'em High", who plays the judge to whom Clint reports?
questions.explanation:
Pat Hingle.

	Pat Hingle is th e judge. Macarthur is the reverend. Begley is a member of the hanging party, as is Hale. Inger Stevens plays the girl friend, Arlene Golonka as the friendly hooker.

questions.text: Who co-starred with Clint in "Bridges of Madison County"?
questions.explanation:
Meryl Streep.

	Kind of a strange pairing.

questions.text: In "The Beguiled", Clint plays a soldier. In what war?
questions.explanation:
Civil War.

	Wounded soldier among a bunch of curious women. Interesting idea.

questions.text: Who played the strange woman in "Play Misty For Me"?
questions.explanation:
Jessica Walter.

	Donna Mills played the girl friend. Fairly good thriller.

questions.text: It's hard to imagine Clint in a musical, but he starred in "Paint Your Wagon". Who co-starred with him?
questions.explanation:
Lee Marvin.

	Something different for him - that's for sure. Burton co-starred with Clint in "Where Eagles Dare".

questions.text: What is Clint's occupation in "True Crime"?
questions.explanation:
Reporter.

	Will the reporter-on-the-track of-the-truth find it in time to save the inmate from impending execution? (Sounds familiar, doesn't it?)

questions.text: Which of these movies co-starred Clint's one-time girl-friend, Sondra Locke?
questions.explanation:
The Outlaw Josey Wales.

	They're all Clint's movies, but Locke was in "Wales".

questions.text: In "Absolute Power", Clint witnesses a crime being committed by what person?
questions.explanation:
President of the U.S.

	Gene Hackman as the president. E.G. Marshall as his betrayed friend. Pretty good.

questions.text: Which movie does not include Clint in the cast?
questions.explanation:
Heist.

	"Heist" is a Gene Hackman movie (with Danny DeVito). "World" co-stars Kevin Costner.
